operating_fees.info: Per each initiated tonne of MTOW

other_information: Charges for aerodromes: Landing charges - Per each initiated tonne of MTOW 100,00, Parking charges - Out of hangar (per each initiated 24 hours) 50,00, In hangar (per each initiated 24 hours) 100,00, First 2 hours free of charge, Charges for passenger service - NIL
